text: Anthony Russo (born February 3, 1970) and Joseph Russo (born July 18, 1971) are American directors, producers, screenwriters, and actors. They direct most of their work together. They are best known for directing four movies in the Marvel Cinematic Universe: Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014), Captain America: Civil War (2016), Avengers: Infinity War (2018), and Avengers: Endgame (2019). ==References== Category:1970 births Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Duos Category:American movie actors Category:Movie directors from Ohio Category:Movie producers from Ohio Category:Screenwriters from Ohio Category:Actors from Cleveland
title: Russo brothers
